publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2099# Bill Butler: Co-op Dividend Payout—That the Parliament notes the record dividend payout totalling £2.75 million by the Scottish Co-op to its 400,000 Scottish members; welcomes the efforts of the co-operative movement in such initiatives as the promotion of Fairtrade produce and the honest labelling of food with clear nutritional information, and hopes that the Co-op will continue to flourish and show that co-operative and mutually-run enterprises, based upon the principles of democracy, equality, openness and social responsibility, can be financially successful whilst also benefiting the communities in which they operate. Supported by: Marlyn Glen*, Jackie Baillie*, Christine May*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Robin Harper*, Richard Baker*, Paul Martin*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Brian Adam*, Colin Fox*, Shiona Baird*, Donald Gorrie*, Mark Ballard*, Rob Gibson*, Margaret Jamieson*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Mrs Mary Mulligan*, Elaine Smith*, Bristow Muldoon*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*

S2M-2099 Bill Butler: Co-op Dividend Payout—That the Parliament notes the record dividend payout totalling £2.75 million by the Scottish Co-op to its 400,000 Scottish members; welcomes the efforts of the co-operative movement in such initiatives as the promotion of Fairtrade produce and the honest labelling of food with clear nutritional information, and hopes that the Co-op will continue to flourish and show that co-operative and mutually-run enterprises, based upon the principles of democracy, equality, openness and social responsibility, can be financially successful whilst also benefiting the communities in which they operate. Supported by: Marlyn Glen, Jackie Baillie, Christine May, Mr Frank McAveety, Robin Harper, Richard Baker, Paul Martin, Mr Mark Ruskell, Brian Adam, Colin Fox, Shiona Baird, Donald Gorrie, Mark Ballard, Rob Gibson, Margaret Jamieson, Dr Elaine Murray, Mrs Mary Mulligan, Elaine Smith, Bristow Muldoon, Ms Sandra White, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Mike Watson*, Cathie Craigie*, Alex Neil*, Tricia Marwick*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Scott Barrie*, Robert Brown*, Patrick Harvie*, Maureen Macmillan*, Marilyn Livingstone*
S2M-2099 Co-op Dividend Payout (lodged on 1 December 2004) Trish Godman*, Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-2099 Co-op Dividend Payout (lodged on 1 December 2004) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-2099 Co-op Dividend Payout (lodged on 1 December 2004) Christine Grahame*
S2M-2099 Co-op Dividend Payout (lodged on 1 December 2004) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2099 Co-op Dividend Payout (lodged on 1 December 2004) Frances Curran*
S2M-2099 Co-op Dividend Payout (lodged on 1 December 2004) Susan Deacon*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
